notesStmt.note: Leaves stuck on paper (modern restoration). Folios damaged at the beginning and at the end.
Folio 111 contains calendar tables for the years 5587-5605, dated 2137 (1826).
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: A service book according to the Yemenite rite.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Yemenite semi-cursive script, punctuated, of the 18th century. Shalom Zekhariah ben Pinḥas ha-Kohen: inscribed, folio 110v.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine: 'Prayer Book. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 2418.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: N. Mavrocordato: purchased by the British Library from him on 08 October 1881: inscribed, folio [112v].
